code: import React from'react';import TourCard from'../../Shared/TourCard';import{Button,Col}from'reactstrap';import useFetch from'../../hooks/useFetch';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FeaturedToursList=()=>{const{data:featuredTours,loading}=useFetch("tours/featured");if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loader-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loader"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-text",children:"Loading..."})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[Array.isArray(featuredTours)&&featuredTours.map(tour=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{lg:"3",md:"6",sm:"6",className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TourCard,{tour:tour})},tour._id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"viall__btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/tours",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn primary__btn",children:"View All Tours"})})})]});};export default FeaturedToursList;
